solution_line_template: If the solver got a head in {heads_flips} of the {total_flips} flips, he got {total_flips}-{heads_flips} =<<{total_flips}-{heads_flips}={tails_flips}>>{tails_flips} tails
The number of tails than he got more than head is {tails_flips}-{heads_flips}=<<{tails_flips}-{heads_flips}={more_tails_than_heads}>>{more_tails_than_heads}
